title: 17 Celebrities Who Are Just As Emotional About Viola Davis's Acceptance Speech As You Are
text:
17 Celebrities Who Are Just As Emotional About Viola Davis's Acceptance Speech As You Are 
"Viola Davis is a QUEEN! QUEEN I say!!" Getty By Gina Mei Feb 27, 2017 Viola Davis had the whole room sobbing when she gave her acceptance speech for Best Supporting Actress at the Oscars on Sunday — but the celebrities in attendance weren't the only ones getting emotional. Here are just a few more famous people who cried over Viola's speech just as much as you did. 1. Advertisement - Continue Reading Below — Oprah Winfrey (@Oprah) February 27, 2017 2. — Camila Cabello (@camilacabello97) February 27, 2017 3. — Chelsea Peretti (@chelseaperetti) February 27, 2017 Advertisement - Continue Reading Below
